description:
Laffey is a destroyer of http://anidb.net/ch105844 [Eagle Union].
She is named after the USS Laffey, DD-459, a Benson class destroyer which saw combat in the Pacific during WW2. The ship is named after Bartlett Laffey, a Navy Seaman who was awarded the Medal of Honor in 1864. She was sunk on November 13th 1942 at the battle of Guadalcanal.
name: Laffey
